snippet: John G. Rowland, who was implicated in a scheme to hide his consulting work on a congressional campaign, said he was quitting his radio talk show to “take care of some personal issues.”
abstract: Former Connecticut Gov John G Rowland quits his afternoon radio talk show, saying he needs to take care of personal issues; Rowland has been identified in federal court as a co-conspirator in an investigation of improper campaign financing.
lead_paragraph: John G. Rowland, who was implicated in a scheme to hide his consulting work on a congressional campaign, said he was quitting his radio talk show to “take care of some personal issues.”

headline.main: Ex-Connecticut Governor Goes Off Air Amid Campaign-Finance Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Ex-Governor Goes Off Air Amid Inquiry
